name: DodgeCar!
description:
DodgeCar is a singleplayer game where you... Dodge Cars! No, just joking. YOU are the DodgeCar, and you must evade as many blocks as possible, to break the immense highscore of... Play the game to find out! Can you beat it? Post screenshots in the scores section, and leave reviews as well please! :)

In-game instructions, but here they are anyway:

Left and Right arrows to move left and right, Spacebar to restart at any time!

 ---> YOU ARE THE CAR! DODGE THE BLOCKS!
